Articles.Content:
25/m/Ct. likes long walks on the beach, dinner by candle light, and romantic.... wait a minute. where am i? Oh yea. SPACE! the final FRONTIER.

Hi folks,

I am not new to Kerbol, but I am new at this forum, or any internet forum for that matter. skimmed over the rules, and I hope that I can truly contribute to this awesome game. I heard about KSP from a friend of mine, and I loved it the moment I built my first MiG, to my latest Oil Tanker in orbit. I intend on going the next few days to religiously check this forum, and then continue to check this like Facebook.

My latest adventure found me [Career Mode] filling up my Oil Tanker Station, repeatedly crashing on Duna, a Space Station above Ike, rescuing my Kerbonauts from Minmus and the Mun.

Squad i love you guys.

Sincerely,

THIS GUY!
Hello Jngodup. Welcome to the forum.

Welcome to the KSP Forums: the best and friendliest place on the internet to ever exist. Seriously, you'd be hard pressed to upset someone here. Any questions? Ask them. Literally any question, there's no such thing as a stupid question on these forums. We don't judge people We help people. We improve each other's skills, increase each others' knowledge, we have a whale of a time while we're doing it, help each other, make suggestions to the devs, make suggestions to the modding community...

Basically, you'll absolutely love it here. Welcome .
Welcome! Sounds like you also found this addiction we call KSP.

IT'S NOT AN ADDICTION!!!

It's a life choice, lol.

You only live once

But if you play Kerbal Space Program

You can HIRE more lives, and as a bonus they come with awesome names.

(thanks)
I know them feels, Jngodup - getting over denial is the first step to freedom! But who wants to get over a KSP addiction, right?

The friend who got me into KerbalSpaceProgram has been slammed with work for the past 2-4 months. He looks sickly, pale, sunken eyes, hair all messed up, and nearly close to death.

Now I can't determine if its because he is truly from working ridiculous hours or lack of KSP.

p.s. thank you for all the love
